Plot: Dor agreed to act as King of Xanth so long as Trent was gone for a week. But the weeks passed and Trent did not return. Dor knew he had to rescue his king but with no magic powers, how could it be done...?
Characters: Smash, Cherie, Crombie, Beauregard, Chameleon, Humfrey, Justin Tree, Crunch, Dor, Gorgon, Grundy, Borywog, Doreen, Fracto, Gerome, Hiatus, Ichabod, Imp Ortant, Lacuna, Oary, Omen, Weedles, Zilch, Iris (Piers Anthony), Jewel, Millie, Irene, Trent, Roland, Bianca, Jonathan, Chet
